root.name: 3D Analysis
root.description: 3D geometrical and shape measurements of 3D Area Rois (3D objects).
root.author: tboudier - Thomas Boudier
root.changelog:
- Version 0.0.1.8 Date 2017-07-19 08:00:08
Check if the Roi3D is not empty
- Version 0.0.1.7 Date 2017-06-02 04:04:26
Change to display roi name instead of roi id.
- Version 0.0.1.6 Date 2017-05-22 09:57:45
Removed output text
- Version 0.0.1.5 Date 2017-05-22 09:37:19
Redesigned output with sequence name and object id.
- Version 0.0.1.4 Date 2014-10-13 10:05:11

- Version 0.0.1.3 Date 2014-06-25 05:16:33
Checks if a sequence is opened.

New computations for the compactness.
- Version 0.0.1.1 Date 2014-05-08 09:09:30
